c74object.name: bl.mc.snapshot~
c74object.digest: Take snapshot of an mc signal and output it as a list
c74object.description: Similar to snapshot~ or mc.snapshot~, but it outputs the values as a list.

inlet.digest: The rate of snapshotting in milliseconds. Default is 250 ms.

outlet.digest: The snapshot of the multichannel signal as a list

objarg.name: rate
objarg.digest: The rate of snapshotting in milliseconds.
